name: Quadriga Consulting
overview:
Quadriga Consulting provides evidence based consulting, marketing research and content development services to leading B2B and technology companies.

We develop and provide market focused content for corporate communications, research based thought leadership reports, white papers, corporate blogs and rich media content.

Members of our senior team speak regularly at international events on behalf of clients. We also provide senior communications counsel to senior managers in our client companies.

The core team at Quadriga Consulting Ltd has gained considerable operational management expertise across the following key sectors:

Software and IT Services Telecommunications Managed Service Solutions Electronics Manufacturing Public Sector
